thread.title: 75-year-old man dies in A35 Bridport lorry crash | Country (W)
thread.title_full: 75-year-old man dies in A35 Bridport lorry crash | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: 75-year-old man dies in A35 Bridport lorry crash | Country (W)
text:
Police are still at the scene of the collision. Credit: ITV West Country The police have confirmed that a 75-year-old man from Torquay has died following a collision between a car and a lorry on the A35 in Bridport.
The road will remain closed in both directions for at least another hour, as investigations continue.
Diversions via a local route using the B3162 are causing long queues around the town.
Last updated Tue 4 Aug 2015 Read more 5 updates Serious crash closes A35 in Bridport Travel Dorset Bridport
